body.raw:
{
    "merchantUid": "{{merchantUid}}",
    "uid": "{{uid}}",
    "borrowers": [
        {
            "disabled": false,
            "dateOfBirth": "{{DOB}}",
            "monthlyGrossIncome": {{monthlyGrossIncome}},
            "ssn": "{{SSN}}",
            "confirmSSN": "{{confirmSSN}}",
            "howMuchDoYouNeed": {{LoanAmount}},
            "line1": "{{HomeAdd1}}",
            "line2": "{{HomeAdd2}}",
            "zipCode": "{{ZipCode}}",
            "city": "{{city}}",
            "state": "{{state}}",
            "isPermanentAddressSameAsInstallation": {{Permanent_CurrentAddressSame}},
            "isHomeOwner": {{Homeowner}},
            "isApplicationConsent": true,
            "firstName": "{{legalFirstName}}",
            "lastName": "{{legalLastName}}",
            "phone": "{{MobilePhone}}",
            "email": "{{email}}",
            "uid": "{{uid}}",
            "isDeleted": false,
            "isPrimary": true
        },
        {
            "value": null,
            "firstName": "{{legalFirstName}}",
            "lastName": "{{legalLastName}}",
            "phone": "{{MobilePhone}}",
            "email": "{{cobemail}}",
            "isActive": true,
            "isPrimary": false,
            "isDeleted": false
        }
    ],
    "howMuchDoYouNeed": {{LoanAmount}},
    "source": "borrower-portal",
    "isNewOwner": true,
    "submissionStage": "bo_application"
}
